mapper.insert: insert into grouby_spot(group_id, spot_name, reg_id, reg_date, mod_date) values (#{groupId}, #{spotName}, #{regId}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select spot.spot_id, spot.group_id, spot.spot_name, spot.reg_id, spot.reg_date, spot.mod_date, ggroup.group_name from grouby_spot spot, grouby_group ggroup where spot.group_id = #{value} and spot.group_id = ggroup.group_id
